channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Website of Jamal Sohail

item.title: Connotate - Master Project
item.description: Application for lawyers to collaborate analyzing Terms of Service documents. Makes Google Docs unnecessary. Editor Editor - Whatsapp Example The heart piece of the application is the editor where several users can create sections of the document and afterwards annotate them. An annotation can be a label or a legal opinion. Lastly users can also discuss, like and comment on all annotation made in the document. Login Page Login The authentication is done via JWT. There’s not much to tell here besides the original design. Home Page Home The home page displays all previous visited documents, the status of your uploaded documents and also the task you have been assigned by other lawyers

item.title: Swift Compiler
item.description: Compile Swift code in a web application View Web Application Swift Compiler Small project I did on the side that compiles Swift code. The compiler also shows the live output of the console.

item.title: Image Classificator - Bachelor Thesis
item.description:
Abstract Prediction of number in an android application
The thesis describes the integration of the geometry aware sparse grids into thedatamining pipeline of the SG++ framework. The datamining pipeline is used tomake SG++ easier available and fasten the process of using the framework. Geometryaware sparse grids have a great use in image classification and therefore this thesis isadditionally about creating a mobile application that classifies hand drawn numbersusing this kind of sparse grids. For this to be done the trained data had to be exportedfrom SG++ and then imported again into the application. Also the evaluation method for sparse grids was implemented into the application.
